channel.title: SoulNous - 718 Pking/Eco
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://soulnous.org/images/Logo.jpg[/img] SoulNous is the best pking server you can find around. There's different types of pking you can do which include clan wars (safe) and (risk) portals along with a multi risk portal and a safe nonrisk portal (funpk) You get SoulNous Tokens for pking/skilling/bossing and can spend them in the shops for chaotics or gear and other great rewards!
Website: [url=http://SoulNous.org/]http://SoulNous.org/[/url] Forums: [url=http://Soulnous.org/forums/]http://Soulnous.org/forums/[/url] Client Download: [url=http://Soulnous.org/SoulNous]http://Soulnous.org/SoulNous[/url] Client.jar Donate: [url=https://rspsdata.org/system/store.php?id=113]https://rspsdata.org/system/store.php?id=113[/url]
Owners: E2B
Features: -718/742(Pre-EoC)~ -25+ Average Online~ -Scarlet Spirit Shield~ -Drygores~ -Upgradeable Tzhaar whips~ -All items~ -All Skills~ -Fully working PvP system~ -SoulNous Tokens From pking/bossing -Donator Zone -Full time staff, in different time zones~ -Weekly updates~ -Unique home~ -Always Online + No Lag~ -Fullscreen client + Webclient~ -FULL Clan Wars pvp! Safe + Risk~ -Two Multi pk zones! Safe + Risk~ -Squeal of fortune & daily spins~ -Double xp on weekends~ -All Auras with little to no cooldowns~ -Better & Fast Boss Drops~ -Loyalty Points + Rewards Shop~ -Large Community + Active Staff~ -Auto Donate!~ -Auto Vote [SOON]~ -HighScores [SOON]~ -CrystalChest~
Bosses: -Fully Scripted Nex and Nomad with cut-scenes -All Godwars Bosses -King Black Dragon + Queen Black Dragon -Corporal Beast -Tormented Demons
Minigames: -Zombies! [FAST XP] -Creations -Duel Arena -Pest Control -And More!
Server Specs Bandwidth 4000GB/2TB Ram: 2GB Windows Server 2008 ! 75 gig diskspace [Will update it soon to better one ;)]
Some Pictures: [IMG]http://gyazo.com/7c4b053e94c1ecdbe9c94635fb8eec4f.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/f3ca3b5ff30446ec7922f27f7d78e6ae.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/d1707f4ff1ee9279bae0edece3b81c65.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/2382b7e428ebed22bff34540d155d9eb.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/b9af4d9b4a993615dba520a04fe75eb9.png[/img] The Green Card mean The player is Safe !
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/08e5e3dffab0bd79191f3d28f648aecd.png[/img] This Swords Mean Other Players can Attack me.
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/97ab8b22091ca30bb7f0315851687b3d.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/d22165f6d5f8617a8708300908f337b7.png[/img] Donator Zone ^ ^
Donator Commands :
One: [IMG]http://gyazo.com/4e32a12a350b303d2235eb4f8198260e.png[/img]
Two: [IMG]http://gyazo.com/c164a155eb17301fcba0af19b2a9b965.png[/img]
Join Join Join !
Atm we got only Client , Webclient Soon .
[/CENTER]
